StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetAuthorizedPermissions]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @intPostID int ) AS
SELECT null as ContextOrgID, rp.PermissionId FROM Post p WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Role r on p.RoleID = r.Id INNER JOIN RolePermission rp on r.Id = rp.RoleId Where p.Id = @intPostID AND rp.RequiresContext = 0 UNION SELECT p.OrgUnitID as ContextOrgID, rp.PermissionId FROM Post p WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Role r on p.RoleID = r.Id INNER JOIN RolePermission rp on r.Id = rp.RoleId Where p.Id = @intPostID AND rp.RequiresContext = 1 UNION SELECT dorgs.Decendent as ContextOrgID, rp.PermissionId FROM Post p WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN Role r on p.RoleID = r.Id INNER JOIN RolePermission rp on r.Id = rp.RoleId INNER JOIN [USMC].[Ext_MCRISS_vwDecendentOrgs] dorgs on p.OrgUnitID = dorgs.Parent Where p.Id = @intPostID AND rp.RequiresContext = 1 UNION SELECT OrgUnitID as ContextOrgID, PermissionId FROM PostPermission WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE PostID = @intPostID
